name: Chocolate Chip Cheesecake
author: Shari Landewe
instructions: Mix cookie crumbs and butter. Press evenly on bottom of ungreased springform pan. In a large bowl, beat remaining ingredients, except chocolate chips, until smooth. Mix in chocolate chips. Pour cheese mixture over crumb mixture. Bake at 300Â° for 1 hour. Cover and refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
